benchmark_details.name: TREC iKAT 2024 Collection
benchmark_details.overview: The TREC iKAT 2024 collection provides resources for assessing the retrieval effectiveness and relevance of responses generated by Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) systems, including 17 conversations, 20,575 relevance passage assessments, and extracted gold nuggets for evaluation.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To advance the evaluation of personalized conversational search agents (CSA) and evaluate response generation using a nugget-based evaluation framework.

data.source: TREC iKAT 2024 collection built upon TREC iKAT 2023 resources.
data.annotation: Passage relevance and nugget extraction annotated by NIST assessors.

methodology.calculation: Metrics computed based on the comparison of generated responses against gold nuggets.
methodology.interpretation: Higher metrics indicate better matching and evaluation of generated responses.
methodology.validation: Evaluated using benchmark responses and characterized using crowd-sourced annotation.
